casebody.data:
John VITALE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 4, 2018 James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition. James A. Kitten, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner John Vitale's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 844 , 178 A.3d 418 (2017), is denied.

D'AURIA and MULLINS, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
